text:
I explain this bug with KeptBodySize on trunk.

KeptBodySize is provided by Core <http://httpd.apache.org/docs/trunk/en/mod/core.html> .
Core was translated to German and Japanese.
Because both are outdated, both don't have KeptBodySize.

Then, see directives.html.
German:   http://httpd.apache.org/docs/trunk/de/mod/directives.html
Japanese: http://httpd.apache.org/docs/trunk/ja/mod/directives.html
They don't have a link to KeptBodySize, but there are no outdated message.

Spanish and Korean page have a link (to English).
Korean:  http://httpd.apache.org/docs/trunk/ko/mod/directives.html
Spanish: http://httpd.apache.org/docs/trunk/es/mod/directives.html
creator: takashi.asfbugzilla@tks.st

text: If you have an idea how to fix that - patches are welcome :-)
creator: nd@perlig.de
rbowen@apache.org
text: Moving docs bugs to docs@httpd.a.o ownership.

Andre's recent changes to the XSLT processing closes this issue. All directives are now listed. However, many of those links won't do what's expected in the event that documents are missing - which is fine, I think, and better than them being entirely missing.
creator: rbowen@apache.org
